name: 李瑞元
objective: 本課程旨在介紹各種能源的來源、轉換、儲存與其再生利用轉換之技術，重點包括燃燒、廢熱回收、核能動力、太陽能及燃料電池同時並強調經濟效益評估，程序效益分析及操作設備的節能措施。
schedule:
Weeks 1-3: Energy Basics
Week 4: World Energy Use
Weeks 5, 6: Fossil Energy
Weeks 7, 8: Nuclear Energy
Week 9: Mid-term Exam
Weeks 10, 11: Energy Conservation
Weeks 12, 13: Energy Storage
Weeks 14, 15: Future Prospects
Weeks 16-18: Final Presentation
materials:
Richard A Dunlap. Sustainable Energy, SI Edition. CENGAGE Learning 2015.
能源概論，莊瑞榮譯（原著：Richard A Dunlap），歐亞書局2015。
